title: elementary OS 8 to Ship with Wayland by Default, Based on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS
description:
elementary OS 8 distribution will arrive in late 2024 based on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS and shipping with Wayland by default, as well as other major changes. Here's what to expect!

The post elementary OS 8 to Ship with Wayland by Default, Based on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: Fedora Linux 39 Is Now Available for Download, Powered by Linux Kernel 6.5
description:
Fedora Linux 39 distribution is now available for download powered by Linux kernel 6.5 and featuring the latest GNOME 45 desktop environment.

The post Fedora Linux 39 Is Now Available for Download, Powered by Linux Kernel 6.5 appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
